news.title: 欧洲慌了！特朗普新秩序逼盟友
美航母战斗群集结伊朗附近，卫星图像证实军事施压
news.title0: US build-up of warships and fighter jets tracked near Iran
news.content: BBC通过卫星图像确认美国航母“林肯号”已部署在伊朗附近海域，美军正通过集结舰机向伊朗施加军事压力。
news.content0: BBC Verify has confirmed the location of US aircraft carrier the USS Abraham Lincoln near Iran using satellite imagery, as Washington continues to put pressure on the country over its military program and recentdeadly crackdown on protesters.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 好莱坞传奇罗伯特·杜瓦尔去世，享年95岁
news.title0: Actor Robert Duvall, who starred in The Godfather, dies aged 95
news.content: 曾主演《教父》、《现代启示录》的奥斯卡影帝罗伯特·杜瓦尔在家中安详离世，享年95岁。
news.content0: Robert Duvall, who starred in The Godfather and Apocalypse Now, has died at the age of 95, according to US news reports.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 奥巴马澄清外星人言论：存在但未造访地球
news.title0: Obama clarifies views on aliens after saying 'they're real' on podcast
news.content: 美国前总统奥巴马澄清，宇宙中存在外星生命的概率很高，但他在任期间未发现外星人造访地球的证据。
news.content0: Former US President Barack Obama has clarified that the chances Earth has been visited by aliens is "low" after comments he made about extra-terrestrial species caught attention online.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 女运动员回击针对其外貌的“怪异”评论
news.title0: Female athletes hit back at 'weird' and 'derogatory' comments about their appearance
news.content: 多位国际女运动员表示，她们常在网上遭遇针对其外貌的贬损性评论，并强调运动表现与外表无关。
news.content0: They are competing on the world stage at the top of their game - but it's not the sport that some spectators are focusing on.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 意大利“情人拱门”在情人节当天坍塌入海
news.title0: Italy's 'Lovers’ Arch' collapses into sea on Valentine's Day
news.content: 意大利普利亚大区著名的天然岩石拱门“情人拱门”在情人节当天因恶劣天气坍塌入海，当地旅游业受打击。
news.content0: A famous rock structure in Italy dubbed "Lovers' Arch" collapsed on Valentine's Day after days of heavy rain and strong winds.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 古象骨或证实汉尼拔率战象翻越阿尔卑斯山
news.title0: Ancient bone may prove legendary war elephant crossing of Alps
news.content: 考古学家在西班牙发现一块大象足骨，可能为迦太基名将汉尼拔率战象军团远征欧洲的传说提供首个实物证据。
news.content0: An elephant foot bone found by archaeologists digging in southern Spain may be evidence that a troop of war elephants stomped through ancient Europe.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 法国学生遇害案令极左翼政党承压
news.title0: Student death puts French far-left under pressure
news.content: 法国里昂一名学生遭“反法西斯”分子袭击身亡，事件引发政治风波，极左翼政党“不屈法国”面临巨大压力。
news.content0: France's radical left is under pressure after the killing of a student in Lyon was blamed on "anti-fascist" militants.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 洛根·保罗稀有宝可梦卡拍出1650万美元天价
news.title0: Logan Paul’s ‘holy grail’ of Pokémon cards sells for $16.5 million, with a diamond necklace thrown in
news.content: 网红兼摔角手洛根·保罗收藏的一张稀有“皮卡丘插画家”宝可梦卡以1650万美元成交，创下新纪录并附赠钻石项链。
news.content0: Five years ago, Logan Paul set a world record when he purchased a Pokémon card for $5.275 million. It proved a sound investment – the influencer and wrestler sold that card for a jaw-dropping $16.492 million, with a diamond encrusted necklace thrown in.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 叙利亚政府军挺进北部，试图弥合内战最大裂痕
news.content: 叙利亚政府军进入北部大片新区域，旨在消除内战遗留的最大裂痕，当地面临严重的人道需求与深刻分裂。
news.content0: The Syrian Army has moved into vast new regions, seeking to erase the largest fissure left from the civil war.
news.author: NYTimes
